title: i need help (league not opening)
body:
League of legends is not opening at all, i have tried an extreme amount of techniques to fix it, but nothing has worked.
 I have re installed it,
 restarted computer,
 deleted files, 
added adobe air files,
 ran as admin,
 lowered my resolution,
i even copied some league of legends files from my laptop and put them into the computer, but nothing has worked. 
Help is greatly appreciated and i at least want to find the source of the problem 
Thanks
